{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In dem Brandm√ºllerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR> klugen und verst√§ndigen Hau√ü-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> � <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda ne√º fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantz√∂sischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":4,"explanation":"1) Closed an erroneously reopened </TITLE> tag after "Land-Leben" by removing the stray </TITLE> and keeping the sentence as plain text within the first <BIBL>.
2) Wrapped the segment "des Herrn Abbts Fleury Kirchen-Historien 8vo. aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt" into a single coherent <BIBL> block, adding a missing <BIBL> start tag before <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> and a closing </BIBL> after "ubersetzt".
3) Ensured that each bibliographic unit (Project..., Lutheri Bibel..., Fleury Kirchen-Historien..., die gantze Pflicht des Menschen...) is consistently enclosed in its own <BIBL> element.
4) Left the mojibake characters (e.g. √º, √§, √ü) and the stray control-like character between </VOLUME> and <PRIZE> as literal text, since they do not break XML well-formedness; only structural tag issues were corrected."}

parsed.explanation:
1) Closed an erroneously reopened </TITLE> tag after "Land-Leben" by removing the stray </TITLE> and keeping the sentence as plain text within the first <BIBL>.
2) Wrapped the segment "des Herrn Abbts Fleury Kirchen-Historien 8vo. aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt" into a single coherent <BIBL> block, adding a missing <BIBL> start tag before <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> and a closing </BIBL> after "ubersetzt".
3) Ensured that each bibliographic unit (Project..., Lutheri Bibel..., Fleury Kirchen-Historien..., die gantze Pflicht des Menschen...) is consistently enclosed in its own <BIBL> element.
4) Left the mojibake characters (e.g. √º, √§, √ü) and the stray control-like character between </VOLUME> and <PRIZE> as literal text, since they do not break XML well-formedness; only structural tag issues were corrected.
